response.summary: I am a responsible, proactive and creative person with a strong feeling of commitment with work. I have social abilities for teamwork with different professions and to guide projects in many different areas.
response.skills: Desarrollo Sostenible, Gestión de residuos, Ingeniería química, Gestión de proyectos, Ingeniería, Environmental Engineering, Project Management, Gestión de residuos peligrosos, Investigación y desarrollo, Process Simulation, Research, Ingeniería medioambiental, Hazardous Waste Management, Evaluación de impacto ambiental, Química, Environmental Impact Assessment, Desarrollo sostenible, Sostenibilidad, Ciencias ambientales, Matlab

profile_positions.title: Asociada técnica para sustitución de COP

profile_positions.description: Support the consolidation and information analysis, consultation with stakeholders and the formulation of Stage III of the HPMP within the framework of the commitments of the Montreal Protocol in Colombia.
profile_positions.title: Individual Contractor

profile_positions.description:
1. Support consolidation and wording of the final version of a document on technical guidelines for the proper environmental management of scrap inside and outside recycler facilities. 

2. Update the environmental guide for the treatment of end-of-life vehicles (ELVU) or vehicle disintegration, incorporating the concepts of Best Available Techniques (BAT) and Best Environmental Practices (BEP), especially those related to the safe environmental management of persistent organic pollutants (POPs).    

3. Socialize the documents developed, with the different actors in value chain, mainly recyclers' organizations, iron and steel companies, environmental authorities and authorised treatment facilities for end-of-life vehicles.
profile_positions.title: Individual Contractor

profile_positions.description:
1. Analize the collected information on importation and production of industrial chemical substances and products, as well as generation of waste containing these substances. 

2. Prepare a document based on bibliografic review of industrial POP substitutes that could be used in PFOS, SCPP, PCN and brominated retardants consumer sectors. 

3. Design demonstrative projects for industrial POP substitution on Colombian Industry taking into account the industrial chemical susbstances management guidelines of Ministry of Environment and Sustainable Development, the risk assessment and GHS. 

4. Prepare the technical sheets describing the activities to be carried out in project implementation.
profile_positions.title: Technical Specialist in Hazardous Waste and Chemical Substances

profile_positions.description: Provide professional services to support the component of environmental impact assessment and in the areas of collection, analysis and systematization of information, design of methodologies and preparation of partial and final reports.
profile_positions.title: Professional Contractor

profile_positions.company: Alcaldia de Bogotá Secretaría Distrital de Ambiente
profile_positions.description: Provide professional services in the execution of priority actions to promote and strengthen environmentally sound management of hazardous waste, focused on the industrial, commercial and mass consumption sectors. Consolidate, analyse and disseminate information on the generation and management of hazardous waste Update the procedure of the Integrated Management System of the Hazardous Waste Group. Contribute to the development of indicators on the generation and management of hazardous, organic and special waste. Conduct an analysis of incidents related to abandoned hazardous waste emergencies. Support the development of a diagnosis to identify sectors that produce, consume or generate Persistent Organic Pollutants (POPs) or Substances that deplete the ozone layer (SAO). Carry out visits to companies selected by the SDA for the environmentally sound management of hazardous waste. Consolidate and analyse monthly the report of activities and results achieved.
profile_positions.title: Professional Contractor

company.name: TECNOLOGÍAS AMBIENTALES DE COLOMBIA - TECNIAMSA S.A E.S.P

profile_positions.company: TECNOLOGÍAS AMBIENTALES DE COLOMBIA - TECNIAMSA S.A E.S.P
profile_positions.description: Inspect and verify the waste that arrives at the security landfill, in accordance with the legal guidelines that apply to it. Coordinate with the laboratory the sampling of waste in order to corroborate the hazardous characteristics associated with it. Verify the relevance of the pretreatment determined by the research and development department according to waste status and laboratory results. Communicate pretreatment changes to different stakeholders. Design the pretreatment mixtures according to the physicochemical characteristics of the waste. Supervise and verify the pretreatment of waste in the different assigned areas. Request the supplies required for pretreatment.
profile_positions.title: Technical Supervisor

company.name: TECNOLOGÍAS AMBIENTALES DE COLOMBIA TECNIAMSA S.A E.S.P

profile_positions.company: TECNOLOGÍAS AMBIENTALES DE COLOMBIA TECNIAMSA S.A E.S.P
profile_positions.description: Review online the documents necessary for the reception assessment. Study the physical-chemical characteristics of the waste. Define and communicate if the waste is accepted or rejected and the pretreatment to apply. Provide technical support to customers who require it. Preparation of technical documents and design of chemical equations for pretreatments.
profile_positions.title: Technical Assistant

profile_positions.description:
The student support program is primarily for first year undergraduate engineering students. Some of my functions were: 
Solve students' doubts about basic chemistry. 
Make classes about topics wich would be complicated or could require more information or time for learning them.
profile_positions.title: Teaching Assistant

profile_positions.description: Evaluation of Activated Carbon from oil palm waste for wastewater contaminated with phenol treatment
profile_positions.title: Research Assistant
Monitor on subject: Thermodinamic and transport properties Laboratory

profile_positions.description:
Support on conceptual design and management of projects in order to improve the company production process in different plants. 
Make feasibility studies of potential use of alternative fuels into production process.
profile_positions.title: Internship

education.degree_name: Magíster en Medio Ambiente y Desarrollo

company.name: PNUD Colombia
company.description:
El Programa de las Naciones Unidas para el Desarrollo es el organismo de las Naciones Unidas que promueve el cambio y conecta a los países con los conocimientos, la experiencia y los recursos necesarios para ayudar a los pueblos a forjar una vida mejor.

Está presente en 177 países y territorios, trabajando con los gobiernos y las personas para ayudarles a encontrar sus propias soluciones a los retos mundiales y nacionales del desarrollo. Mientras que fortalecen su capacidad local, los países aprovechan los conocimientos del personal del PNUD y de su amplio círculo de asociados para obtener resultados concretos.
